TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IColorizeBackground

Docs.summary: This interface is implemented by Elements that needs to update their cells Background properties just before they are displayed to the user. This is an iOS 3 requirement to properly render a cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WillDisplay (MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableView tableView, MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCell cell, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSIndexPath indexPath);
